system.description: You are adept at using your studies to advise others, as well as yourself, for there are few that share your burden of knowledge. You may spend inspiration to allow yourself or another creature to regain a use of an ability with limited uses per long rest. This cannot be used to restore spell slots, nor can a single creature benefit from this more than once per long rest. You also gain inspiration anytime you finish a long rest if you do not already have it.
